content.rendered:
The student registration module upgraded from 8.7 to 9.0.  With this upgrade, the student registration is more intuitive and easier to use.
  

Some key features:

  • Upgrade from 8.7 to 9.0.
  • New UI (User Interface) with familiar features.
  • Fewer clicks outside of the registration experience.
  • Single page integration of the schedule of classes, the calendar grid, and course registration.
  • Video (1:38) OR PDF.

Additional supportive materials  and videos are below.

 

BANNER 9 REGISTRATION

ACADEMIC ADVISORS 👨‍🏫

Remove Academic Advising Hold: Video OR PDF

 

STUDENTS 🎓

Financial Agreement Acceptance at Registration: Video OR PDF

Update or Confirm Contact Information at Registration: Video OR PDF
Features (Videos):

  • Clear Holds that Prevent Registration (1:58)
  • Prepare for Registration and Browse Courses (3:35)
  • Search Catalog Courses (4:13)
  • Using Course Search Criteria (4 ways) (3:45)
  • View Priority Registration Day and Time (0:45)
  • Who’s my Academic Advisor? (And how to email them) (3:00)

 

 

 Features (Videos)(Cont.):

  • Add Yourself to a CLOSED Course Wait List (2:22)
  • Change Unit Value for a Variable Unit Course (1:39)
  • Drop OR Withdraw from a Course (from the schedule of classes) (1:58)
  • How to Identify Semester or Session-based Courses by Date (3:05)
  • Register for Classes (without linked labs) (6:31)
  • Register for Classes (with linked lab(s) (4:04)
  • View and Print Schedule of Classes (2:15)

🎓
